Setting parameter values into xml files

Source: R/set_param_xml.R
set_param_xml.Rd

Setting parameter values for a parameter or a vector of and with a parameters values vector

set_param_xml(
  xml_file,
  param_name,
  param_value,
  out_path = NULL,
  select = NULL,
  value = NULL,
  overwrite = FALSE,
  ...
)

Arguments

xml_file

an xml file path
param_name

parameter names vector, i.e.: parameter name or option code
param_value

A vector or a list of parameter(s) values (see details).
out_path

an xml file path (optional, default: xml_file)
select

node name or attribute name to use for selection (optional, default to no selection)
value

value used for select (optional)
overwrite

Logical TRUE for overwriting the output file, FALSE otherwise (default)
...

Pass further arguments to set_param_value().

Value

A logical value TRUE for operation success, FALSE otherwise

Details

It is possible to give several values for a parameter by passing a vector of values. For example, for two parameters with two values each: param_value= list(c(1,2), c(2.3,4.5))

Examples


if (FALSE) {

# Soil file

file.copy(file.path(get_examples_path( file_type = "xml"),"sols.xml"), getwd())

# For scalar parameters per soil

# Setting all soils "argi" values to 50
set_param_xml("sols.xml", "argi", 50, overwrite = TRUE)

get_param_xml("sols.xml", "argi")

# Setting a specific value to "argi" for "solcanne" soil
set_param_xml("sols.xml", "argi",56,
select = "sol", value = "solcanne", overwrite = TRUE)

get_param_xml("sols.xml", "argi",
select = "sol", value = "solcanne")


# Setting a specific values to 2 parameters "argi" and "norg" for "solcanne" soil
set_param_xml("sols.xml", c("argi", "norg"),list(100,150),
select = "sol", value = "solcanne", overwrite = TRUE)

get_param_xml("sols.xml", c("argi", "norg"),
select = "sol", value = "solcanne")


# For vector parameters per soil (5 values, one per soil layer)
set_param_xml("sols.xml", c("epc", "HCCF"),select = "sol", value = c("solcanne", "solbanane"),
param_value = list(c(20:24,10:14),c(50:54,40:44)), overwrite = TRUE)

get_param_xml("sols.xml", c("epc", "HCCF"),select = "sol", value = c("solcanne", "solbanane"))


# Crop management file
file.copy(file.path(get_examples_path( file_type = "xml"),"file_tec.xml"), getwd())

# Modifying irrigations parameters
set_param_xml("file_tec.xml", c("julapI_or_sum_upvt", "amount"),
param_value = list(200:215,20:35), overwrite = TRUE)

get_param_xml("file_tec.xml", c("julapI_or_sum_upvt", "amount"))

}
